intro.description: This cheat sheet walks you through the steps to create a new Fuse Camel project using the Spring archetype.

item.title: Open the Fuse Integration Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Fuse Integration in the menu bar at the top of the workbench. This step changes the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for development of your Apache Camel routes.

item.title: Open the New Fuse Project wizard
item.description:
To create your new project you now need to open the New Fuse Project wizard. You can do that by selecting File > New > Fuse Project from the top menu bar.
Once its open you can specify the location your project should live in and then on the next page you can select from a list of available archetypes. Please select the archetype camel-archetype-spring from the list. If you want you can change the values for the Maven coordinates and the default package name.
Click on Finish to finally create your new project.
